Invocation Name: brunt
des:
The Brunt (Custom Skill) enables you to control your Brunt devices with Amazon Echo. 
After setting up your devices, enable the Brunt Custom Skill app by logging in with your Brunt application account. 
You can now control the "Welcome and Goodbye" function of all your devices with Amazon Echo.


What is a Welcome/Goodbye feature?
- The Welcome / Goodbye feature allows you to control all your Brunt devices at once within the app. 
Connected with the Alexa commands the Welcome/Goodbye feature allows you to choose which device you would like to turn on or off. 

Welcome: Turns on all your devices.
Goodbye: Turns off all your devices.

How to customize the Welcome/Goodbye feature within the Brunt app.
1) Click the +/- button at the "My device" page.
2) Setup the welcome/goodbye function for each device to raise or lower your blinds.
3) Cick the "Confirm" button on the top right side of the page.
4) You can now control all your blinds with the Welcome/Goodbye function!

Use the Welcome/Goodbye function via voice command through Amazon Echo.
- Alexa, ask Brunt to play "welcome"
- Alexa, ask Brunt to play "goodbye"


*Download the Brunt (Smart Home Skill) app within the Amazon Alexa app to individually control your Blind Engine.
